function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Differences in outbreak timing across patches","Impact":"May lead to uneven spread of contagious diseases in different areas","Mitigation":"Coordinate and synchronize outbreak response efforts across patches to minimize uneven spread","Technologies":"Data analysis and modeling to predict outbreak timing and plan coordinated responses","People":"Public health authorities, local governments, and communities in affected areas","Owner":"Public health authorities, local governments, and coordination bodies"},{"Description":"Ineffectiveness of personal protection measures without local vector control","Impact":"Increased disease burden and risk of outbreak escalation in the absence of local vector control","Mitigation":"Implement and enforce local vector control measures in addition to promoting personal protection measures","Technologies":"Pesticides, vector surveillance and monitoring, public health campaigns for personal protection measures","People":"Local communities, public health authorities, policymakers","Owner":"Local governments and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Impact of concern for disease and concern for bites on disease burden","Impact":"Different levels of concern for disease may affect the effectiveness of personal protection measures and outbreak duration","Mitigation":"Tailor public health messaging to address different levels of concern for disease and bites, and promote appropriate personal protection measures based on the local situation","Technologies":"Health communication strategies, public health campaigns, behavioral interventions","People":"Communities at risk of vector-borne diseases, public health authorities, policymakers","Owner":"Public health authorities and communication experts"}]}
